Jan 27. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight_Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."

American Civil Liberties Union has uncovered thousands of pages of government documents that show that torture was authorized at the highest levels of the Bush administration. Jameel Jaffer , Deputy Legal Director of the ACLU: Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic. If there's any "known known,' it"s that Donald Rumsfeld joined with other officials to orchestrate a program of torture. This effort to rewrite history is shameful. combine our strengths to deliver an ecosystem with unrivalled global reach and scale. It's now a three-horse race." "I am excited about this partnership with Nokia," added Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer . Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation and scale. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute. Nokia will adopt Windows Phone as its principal smartphone strategy, lending hardware design, language support, and helping to bring the platform to a larger range of price points, market segments, and geographies.
